snippet: The government is seeking large fines against the former Goldman Sachs trader Fabrice Tourre. | This year, the biggest Wall Street bonuses may flow to those who worked on I.P.O.’s | The fate of Michael S. Steinberg, a former SAC official, rests...
abstract: The government is seeking large fines against the former Goldman Sachs trader Fabrice Tourre. | This year, the biggest Wall Street bonuses may flow to those who worked on I.P.O.’s | The fate of Michael S. Steinberg, a former SAC official, rests with a jury. | Herbalife shares soar after re-audit report.

byline.original: By CHAD BRAY and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Stiff Penalties Sought Against Ex-Goldman Trader
